author: Allah (God)
review: The holy book of Islam, containing guidance for all aspects of life.

author: Saifur Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
review: A biography of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) highlighting his life and achievements.

bookName: The Forty Hadith of Imam Nawawi
author: Imam Nawawi
review: A collection of forty hadiths (sayings of the Prophet Muhammad) considered essential for understanding Islam.

author: Dr. Abu Ameenah Bilal Philips
review: An in-depth study of the concept of Tawheed (Monotheism) in Islam, its importance, and its implications.

bookName: The Biography of Abu Bakr As-Siddeeq
author: Dr. Ali Muhammad As-Sallabi
review: A comprehensive biography of Abu Bakr As-Siddeeq, the first Caliph of Islam after the Prophet Muhammad.

author: Nouman Ali Khan
review: A collection of insightful reflections on various aspects of faith, spirituality, and personal growth.
